title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Kada - Anantam Bangle
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricate floral design meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans. The central oval emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The band features a repeating floral trellis pattern also accented with diamonds. The openwork design allows for comfortable wear and showcases the brilliance of the gemstones.
colors: Classic combination of vibrant green Emerald and shimmering white Diamonds set against warm yellow Gold.
occasions: and even elegant evening events. A timeless piece that can be passed down as an heirloom.
description: This Kada is a stunning blend of traditional design and modern aesthetics. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting beauty. The Emerald symbolizes prosperity and good health, making it a meaningful gift for loved ones. The unique floral design adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any outfit.
